original_body_lines: Sing-along events will always be special to many as it’s an occasion where the whole family could get-together to enjoy an evening of fun, music…and dinner.
What’s more, guests are also given the opportunity to grab the spotlight for a few minutes!
There’s one coming up on the 20th of May, from 7.30 pm onwards, at the BMICH Banquet Hall.

It’s being held to mark the 47th anniversary of Herbert Perera, as a senior photojournalist, and is in aid of Little Hearts Fund of Lady Ridgway Hospital for children and elderly welfare, and the Medical Fund of United Christian Evangelistic Movement of Sri Jayawardanapura, Kotte.
Sohan & The X-Periemnts will be in attendance, along with guest artiste Mariazelle Goonetilleke.
